Description: It collates and analyses a wide range of publically available data around tobacco smoking, alcohol use and drug use, including data on prevalence, risk factors, treatment demand and treatment response. The tool also features indicators around mental health prevalence and services.
Name: Co-occurring substance misuse and mental health issues
Route from landing page to data: Fingertips Data can be located by clicking on the Green box named 'Start Go to the data' to the right of the introduction.
Sizing Notes: Fingertips  May be better suited to a mental health familiy
